strings.description: A hero who defeated a cruel despot to become king of a nation. Clyne was a brave knight and army commander who earned the loyalty and love of his people. However, he knew little of government, and proved ill-equipped to navigate the politics that entangle such high office. He eventually lost his life under suspicious circumstances, amidst a conspiracy involving succession to the throne.
strings.fusion:
My blade feels stronger...
This energy feels equivalent to actual experience.
strings.summon:
I was called a warrior-king once...
However, I am now a mere knight under your command.

strings.evolution:
So this is an awakening.
This must be how the power of visions develops further.
strings.affinity:
For a long time, now, have I joined your battles.
I thought you would lord it over me, but...it would seem I misjudged you.
strings.description: A knight who became king of a great nation. Clyne was a hero who earned the admiration and loyalty of his people, but had little knowledge of how to rule them, and was eventually killed by his own son in a plot for succession. He died with a deep sense of regret, but his spirit now enjoys the freedom of fighting as a vision.
strings.fusion:
Can I grow stronger still?
There can be no greater joy for a man of war.
strings.summon: The title of warrior-king is far behind me. Though my current state may be temporary, this time I shall wield my sword for justice.
